node.name: ReST Editor
node.shortdescription:
ReST Editor is an Eclipse plug-in providing support to edit reStructuredText files

ReST Editor is an Eclipse plug-in providing support to edit reStructuredText files, released under Eclipse Public License 1.0.

reStructuredText is a markup language that can be transformed in various output formats with tools like Sphinx documentation generator, rst2pdf, rst2beamer, ...

More information here : http://resteditor.sourceforge.net/

Features :

  • Syntax coloring
  • Source normalization (sections, grid tables)
  • Line wrapping (Hard and Soft)
  • Run configuration (runs the Makefile or make.bat)
  • Sphinx project wizard (like sphinx-quickstart)
node.body:
ReST Editor is an Eclipse plug-in providing support to edit reStructuredText files

ReST Editor is an Eclipse plug-in providing support to edit reStructuredText files, released under Eclipse Public License 1.0.

reStructuredText is a markup language that can be transformed in various output formats with tools like Sphinx documentation generator, rst2pdf, rst2beamer, ...

More information here : http://resteditor.sourceforge.net/

Features :

  • Syntax coloring
  • Source normalization (sections, grid tables)
  • Line wrapping (Hard and Soft)
  • Run configuration (runs the Makefile or make.bat)
  • Sphinx project wizard (like sphinx-quickstart)
